oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Nashville's Cedar Street electric streetcar, ca. 1900
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the electric streetcar that transported passengers along the Cedar Street (Charlotte Avenue) line in Nashville. The Tennessee State Capitol is shown in the background. A reproduced photographic print from the original. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.)
